attributes.action: Improve oportunities for young single people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The resolution of the current financial crisis and our future competitiveness as an economic power rely on society being more of a meritocracy, rewarding those who put the most in to our society.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement , about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
